qas.question: On what date was the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR adopted?
What body passed the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR?

answers.text: the Congress of People's Deputies of the Republic

qas.question: What was the name of the period inaugurated by the passage of the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR?
What government was the Russian Federation fighting against during this period?
On what date was the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR rejected?

plausible_answers.text: Congress of People's Deputies of the Republic

qas.question: What body rejected the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR?
What was the name of the period ended by the passage of the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR?
What government was the Russian Federation fighting alongside during this period?
What government was the Russian Federation not fighting against during this period?

context: On <a0_0><b4_0>June 12, 1990<b4_0/><a0_0/>, <a1_0>the <b5_0>Congress of People's Deputies of the Republic<b5_0/><a1_0/> adopted the Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Russian SFSR, which was the beginning of <a2_0>the "<b6_0>War of Laws<b6_0/>"<a2_0/>, pitting <a3_0><b7_0><b8_0>the Soviet Union<b8_0/><b7_0/><a3_0/> against the Russian Federation and other constituent republics.
